title: Welcome to react using react-i18next OLL DESIGN

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.

gallery_groups.badge_hover: グラフィックデザイン

desc.address: ▼Store Production (Domestic & International)|Store design and supervision|Store planning and production|Property introduction, investigation, and sales forecasting|Store renovations and new business development|Consulting for overseas store openings|Production and sales of imported overseas goods (furniture, fixtures, kitchen equipment, etc.)||▼Graphic Design|Logo and web design|Print design (flyers, business cards, menus, etc.) to printing||▼Original Goods Planning, Creation, and Sales|Amusement prizes|Apparel, stationery, miscellaneous goods
Shanghai Onishi Group Architectural Design Consulting Co., Ltd.|No. 2 Warehouse, 1098 Jiangyang South Road, Baoshan District, Shanghai

desc.business: 出店プロデュース（国内・海外対応）

sub_business.name: 店舗企画・店舗設計・設計監理
物件紹介・売上げ予測
店舗改装・新業態開発
国内・海外出店コンサルティング
海外輸入品制作・販売（家具・什器・厨房等

desc.business: グラフィックデザイン

sub_business.name: 紙面デザイン（チラシ・名刺・メニュー等）～印刷
ウェブデザイン・ホームページ作成

desc.business: イベント企画・イベントプロデュース

sub_business.name: 音響設備レンタル・音響スタッフ派遣
オリジナルグッズ作成・販売（Tシャツ・ユニフォ−ム等）

business.description1: At OLL DESIGN, we understand the power of collaboration in bringing retail spaces to life. Our design ethos goes beyond mere aesthetics, delving into the realms of functionality and cost-effectiveness, with our client's smile being the true measure of our success. We employ a dual-design strategy, where 'unconscious design' seamlessly blends into the ambiance for comfort, and 'conscious design' boldly underscores a shop's character, stimulating dialogue. Our unique touch ensures each project stands out, avoiding the mundane.
business.description2: From the initial business cards to the various shop tools required post-launch, such as menus and flyers, we maintain a consistent design narrative. By overseeing the entire process from planning to execution, we craft designs that not only reflect the essence of each shop but also resonate with and captivate the audience. For us, a cool design is one that becomes synonymous with the store or product it represents.
business.prespective: Our perspectives offer a new dimension to architectural vision, providing innovative visualizations and materializing projects. Experience a comprehensive perspective capturing the essence of pre-construction design through detailed renderings and immersive presentations.
business.storedesign: We specialize in providing top-quality designs specially tailored to meet our clients' specific requirements. Our professional and high-quality outputs exceed the expectations of our clients.
business.graphicdesign: Our graphic services, which create visual stories, offer captivating graphic solutions that embody our clients' brand identity. From logos to layouts, we blend art and strategy to create graphic elements that are visually appealing while effectively conveying messages.
business.designconsult: Our consultation services navigate the maze of design, offering expert advice tailored to our clients' unique needs. We listen, analyze, and provide strategic recommendations to ensure that our clients' architectural and design projects are aesthetically satisfying and functionally excellent.
